text: Kaho: main tumhein bataoon ke inse zyada acchi cheez kya hai? Jo log taqwa ki rawish ikhtiyar karein, unke liye unke Rubb ke paas baagh hain, jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi, wahan unhein hameshgi ki zindagi haasil hogi, pakeeza biwiyan unki rafeeq (companions) hongi aur Allah ki raza se woh sarfaraz honge. Allah apne bandon ke rawayye par gehri nazar rakhta hai
